verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>, <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar<s%>, <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%>;

That these <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1298>Bera<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and with <S%H1306>Birsha<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, <S%H8134>Shinab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah<s%>, and <S%H8038>Shemeber<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%>, which <S%H1931>is<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>.
All these were joined <S%H2266>together<s%> in the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%>, <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

<S%H6240>Twelve<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%>, and in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> they <S%H4775>rebelled<s%>.

And in the <S%H6240>fourteenth<s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were with him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H7497>Rephaims<s%> in Ashteroth <S%H6255>Karnaim<s%>, and the <S%H2104>Zuzims<s%> in <S%H1990>Ham<s%>, and the <S%H368>Emims<s%> in Shaveh <S%H7741>Kiriathaim<s%>, Shaveh: or, The plain of Kiriathaim
And the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> in their <S%H2042>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, unto <S%H364>Elparan<s%>, which is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>. Elparan: or, The plain of Paran

And they <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5880>Enmishpat<s%>, which is <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%>, and also the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2688>Hazezontamar<s%>.

And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>;) and they <S%H6186>joined<s%> <S%H4421>battle<s%> with them in the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%>;

With <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>, and with <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>, and <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar<s%>; <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H2568>five<s%>.

And the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> was full of <S%H875><s%> <S%H875>slimepits<s%> <S%H2564><s%>; and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> there; and they that <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7399>goods<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and all their <S%H400>victuals<s%>, and went their <S%H3212>way<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and his <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%>.

And there <S%H935>came<s%> one that had <S%H6412>escaped<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>; for he <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H6063>Aner<s%>: and these were <S%H1167>confederate<s%> <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H87>Abram<s%>.

And when <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that his <S%H251>brother<s%> was taken <S%H7617>captive<s%>, he <S%H7324>armed<s%> his <S%H2593>trained<s%> servants, <S%H3211>born<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6240>eighteen<s%> <S%H8083><s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them unto <S%H1835>Dan<s%>. armed: or, led forth trained: or, instructed

And he <S%H2505>divided<s%> himself against them, he and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> them unto <S%H2327>Hobah<s%>, which is on the left <S%H8040>hand<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>.

And he brought <S%H7725>back<s%> all the <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and also brought <S%H7725>again<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, and his <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%> also, and the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%>, and of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were with him, at the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7740>Shaveh<s%>, <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6010>dale<s%>.

And <S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8004>Salem<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%>: and he was the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H87>Abram<s%> of the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>:

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, which hath <S%H4042>delivered<s%> thine <S%H6862>enemies<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of all.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me the <S%H5315>persons<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7399>goods<s%> to thyself. persons: Heb. souls

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, I have lift <S%H7311>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the most <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, the <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>,

That I will <S%H518>not<s%> take from a <S%H2339>thread<s%> even to a <S%H5275>shoelatchet<s%> <S%H8288><s%>, and that I will <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> any thing that is thine, lest thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%>, I have <S%H6238>made<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H6238>rich<s%>:

<S%H1107>Save<s%> only that <S%H834>which<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%>, and the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> which <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me, <S%H6063>Aner<s%>, <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>; let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H2506>portion<s%>.
